document_data.name: Swamp Beetle
document_data.mainbody: '''Swamp beetles''' were a species of giant [[beetle]]s found in the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Description: Swamp beetles were large flat-bodied insects with green carapaces and two big hard mandibles at the front of their mouths.
document_data.Behavior: Swamp beetles were mostly docile and only attacked if undesirable creatures approached them or provoked the insects.
document_data.Ecology: This beetle species was a common sight in the Mere of Dead Men. The creatures were carrion and decaying vegetation feeders,
document_data.History: Lizardfolk who served [[black dragon]]s [[Waervaerendor]] and [[Voaraghamanthar]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, had several swamp beetles inhabiting the [[Dragon Caves]], once a cavernous shrine to [[Tyr]].
